objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel measuring approximately 10 meters wide by 15 meters long, finished in a sleek white material to form the base of the fair booth with a seamless minimalist appearance.
A sleek white vertical wall panel, 3 meters tall and 10 meters wide, forming the northern enclosure of the fair booth with a clean modern finish.
A sleek white vertical wall panel, 3 meters tall and 10 meters wide, forming the southern enclosure of the fair booth with a clean modern finish.
A sleek white vertical wall panel, 3 meters tall and 15 meters wide, forming the eastern enclosure of the fair booth with a clean modern finish.
A sleek white vertical wall panel, 3 meters tall and 15 meters wide, forming the western enclosure of the fair booth with a clean modern finish.
A realistic demo car model approximately 4.5 meters long and 1.8 meters wide, featuring a detailed exterior finish in showroom condition, positioned to face the booth entrance for optimal viewing.
A sleek metallic gray reception desk measuring 2 meters wide and 0.75 meters tall, with a modern minimalist design for greeting visitors and displaying branded materials.
A vibrant colored display stand 1 meter tall and 0.5 meters wide, designed to hold informational panels about the demo car, featuring a clean and modern angular profile.
A vibrant colored display stand 1 meter tall and 0.5 meters wide, designed to hold informational panels about the demo car, featuring a clean and modern angular profile.
A vibrant colored display stand 1 meter tall and 0.5 meters wide, designed to hold informational panels about the demo car, featuring a clean and modern angular profile.
A sleek dark gray seating chair with an ergonomic design, 0.5 meters wide and 0.9 meters tall, providing comfortable rest for visitors without obstructing traffic flow.
